restructureit.ui.controllers

Class RefactoringController

  • java.lang.Object
    • restructureit.ui.controllers.RefactoringController

  • public class RefactoringController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller that manages the communication between the refactoring Page view and the underlying system.
